summary: An ordinance relating to the Planning Commission; creating therein two (2) positions of Project Planners' Aide (three months) and one (1) assigned position of Administrative Aide - Planning Commission, fixing the compensation thereof; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor, reimbursing the Emergency Fund by transfer of salary savings in the 1953 Budget of said Commission and abolishing two existing positions of City Planners' Aide (three months) and one (1) position of City Planner I.
